short_summary: Rental of Vehicles for Events in the National Capital Region
description: The Department of Patrimoine canadien (PCH) is looking for an Offeror to provide a variety of types of vehicles for use during various events and celebrations held in the National Capital Region. The Department is seeking a Standing Offer Agreement for the provision of items detailed in the Statement of Work at Annex 'A'. The Standing Offer shall be for a period of two (2) firm years, with the possibility of extending the period of the standing offer by up to two (2) additional one (1) year option periods. Evaluation will be based on the pricing grids set out in Annex 'C', and the successful offeror will be selected using the following methodology: LOWEST EVALUATED PRICE. There are mandatory technical criteria associated with the requirement. The mandatory criteria are as follows: M1: Offerors must demonstrate their capacity to provide ALL categories and sub-categories of vehicles listed in paragraph 4.1 of the Statement of Work at Annex A. M2: Offerors must demonstrate their capacity to meet the requirements of paragraph 5.2 of the Statement of Work at Annex A regarding roadworthiness of the vehicles provided. The contract Brief is the emulation of real-time Sales contract which fairly covers all procedure from sales to Legal, financial and marketing affair as leurs Article.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
====================================

**Title**
---------

*   English: **Rental of Vehicles for Events in the National Capital Region**
*   French: **Location de véhicules pour les événements dans la région de la capitale nationale**

**Reference Information**
------------------------

*   **Reference Number**: PW-23-01029422
*   **Amendment Number**: 0
*   **Solicitation Number**: 10221398
*   **Publication Date**: 2023-03-08
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-04-03T14:00:00

**Request for Standing Offer**
-----------------------------

The Department of Canadian Heritage is seeking a contractor to provide a variety of vehicles under a Standing Offer Agreement for use during various events and celebrations held in the National Capital Region.

**Contract Details**
--------------------

*   **Duration**: 2-year firm period, with 2 additional 1-year option periods
*   **Expiry**: May 31st, 2025, with the possibility of extending the period by 2 additional 1-year option periods

**Evaluation Criteria**
----------------------

The selection of a successful offeror will be based on the lowest evaluated price. The evaluation will be based on the pricing grids set out in Annex C and will include a comprehensive review of the potential bidder's capacity to meet the requirements.

**Security Requirements**
----------------------

There are no security requirements associated with this tender.

**Notice and Attachments**
-------------------------

Please visit Canada Buys to access the solicitation documents and attachments related to this tender.

**Additional Information**
------------------------

For more information, please contact:

*   **Name**: Nicholas Stocker
*   **Email**: nicholas.stocker@pch.gc.ca
*   **Phone**: 343-574-8733

Please note that the tender closing date is March 3, 2023 at 2:00 PM local time. All tender submissions must be received by the specified deadline. Late submissions will not be accepted.
